root: ^It's a nice place isn't it? A good break from the city right?
^I moved from the city many years ago, living here makes me feel closer to my Sardinian roots.
^Me and the organization set up our latest findings just beyond the nuraghe, we found some cool stuff dating up to 4000 years ago!
^Check the signs for info, I'm sure you'll discover a lot about your ancestors' culture.
^I also set up a little puzzle game for the kids! I don't know if it's overkill really...
^...and don't ask me how I set that up eheh.
^I'm still working on it, but give it a try! I placed a prize just for you!
